name: Essence Tribute
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature at 0 hit points is killed if it is not already dead. Its normal value of maximum hit points are then evenly divided between all creatures you choose within 60 feet, increasing their maximum hit points and their current hit points to match.

When the spell ends, all affected creatures return to their normal maximum hit points. This kills any creature that falls below 0 maximum hit points.
